Name: Celestine Maria
Details: A Merchant-class JumpShip of unknown registry or owner, the Celestine Maria first jumped into the Lesnovo system in 2987 and was found deserted by the Marik custom officers who boarded the ship. It later jumped out of the system apparenty by itself once the inspection party left and it has been reported since then in several systems of the Free Worlds League but now it always evades any boarding attemps by jumping out.
